email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We have a vessel available for an iron ore shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao. The cargo size is 180,000 MT, and the laycan is October 10-15. The starting freight rate is USD 22 per MT on a CIF basis.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex Morgan
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Could you provide more details on the vessel, such as DWT and LOA? Also, is there any flexibility in the laycan?

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

The vessel is MV OCEAN HORIZON with a DWT of 205,000 and LOA of 300m. The laycan can be adjusted to October 12-17 if needed. We can also consider revising the freight rate to USD 20.50 per MT.

Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for the update. The revised laycan works for us, but we would like to propose a freight rate of USD 19.75 per MT. Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao - Rate Negotiation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We can agree to USD 19.75 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day. Please confirm if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao - Rate Negotiation
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

The terms are acceptable. Please proceed with the booking and send the final documents.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Booking is confirmed. We will send the final documents shortly.

Best regards,
Alex
